title: Springfield Three /// Part 1 /// 97
description:
Springfield Three /// Part 1 /// 97

TrueCrimeGarage.com

High school graduation is to be a time of celebration. Thinking of the memories created with friends over the years and an acknowledgement of accomplishments. June, 1992 - Suzanne Streeter and Stacy McCall just finished high school and planned to spend the first few days of summer with friends. They stayed the night at Suzanne's mother's home. Sometime between 2:30am and 8am the three women disappeared. They are suspected to have been kidnapped and murdered. Outside of several possible serial killers living in the area police are left with very few leads. Tonight we examine the very strange disappearance of the women that now are known as the Springfield Three.

Beer of the week - Spotted Cow by New Glarus brewingGarage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
